title: CEOs Cozy Up to Trump, High Yield Bond Outlook, GE Faces SEC Investigation
itunes:title: CEOs Cozy Up to Trump, High Yield Bond Outlook, GE Faces SEC Investigation
description:
Jenny Surane, Bloomberg News Bank Reporter, discusses how Wall Street CEOs are cozying up to President Trump ahead of his Davos trip. Marty Fridson, CIO at Lehmann, Livian, Fridson Advisors, talks about high yield bonds. Rick Clough, Bloomberg News Industrials Reporter and Joel Levington, Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Credit Analyst, dig into GE earnings and SEC investigation. We Drive to the Close with Cooper Abbott, Chairman and President at Carillon Tower Advisers. And Carol and Cory hit today’s “Movers and Shakers” while Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has his “Stock of the Day.” 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
